stochastic_function: lambda study_decision: {1: 0.899999, 0: 0.1, -1: 0.0} if study_decision == 'study more' else {1: 0.3, 0: 0.7, -1: 0.0}

lambda current_knowledge, health_status, exam_difficulty: {1: 0.7, 0: 0.2, -1: 0.1} if current_knowledge == 1 and health_status == 1 else ({1: 0.6, 0: 0.3, -1: 0.1} if current_knowledge == 1 and health_status == 0 else ({1: 0.5, 0: 0.4, -1: 0.1} if current_knowledge == 1 and health_status == -1 else ({1: 0.6, 0: 0.3, -1: 0.1} if current_knowledge == 0 and health_status == 1 else ({1: 0.5, 0: 0.4, -1: 0.1} if current_knowledge == 0 and health_status == 0 else ({1: 0.4, 0: 0.5, -1: 0.1} if current_knowledge == 0 and health_status == -1 else ({1: 0.5, 0: 0.3, -1: 0.2} if current_knowledge == -1 and health_status == 1 else ({1: 0.4, 0: 0.4, -1: 0.2} if current_knowledge == -1 and health_status == 0 else {1: 0.3, 0: 0.5, -1: 0.2})))))))
